question: [Challenge] Italiano: Comunica which category has the highest bar dal grafico a barre.

qas.question: [Challenge] Italiano: Comunica which category has the highest bar dal grafico a barre.
[Brief] Deutsch: Teile which category has the lowest bar aus dem Balkendiagramm mit.
[Calm] Turkce: Sutun grafiginden what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars bildir.
